column1: You can make tasks and keep track of them here
Color code your tasks to keep track of thier priority
Yellow Tasks are tasks you should be aware of
And Green tasks are tasks you can wait a bit on
And whenever you finish a task
column2: just click the checkbox to mark it done. It's color changes to let you know it's taken care of

column1: Clicking the 'Delete Checked' button will delete all your tasks marked 'Done' so you can focus on what's left
